item.description:
Come join me for an afternoon of authentic Thai food at Siam Orchid in Branford CT.

The New York Times rates Siam Orchid as "Very Good"

For those who do not like spicy food, there is plenty of mild/non-spicy items to choose from on the menu. They can also alter any dish according to your taste.

The fresh Thai spring rolls are not to be missed!

When: January 16th at 2:00 PM

where: Siam Orchid Authentic Thai Cuisine
899 W. Main ST
Branford, CT 06405

Why: To start the New Year off with great friends...some old.....meeting some new!

*Individual checks will be provided to make things simple.

**Also, for those who are post-holiday budget conscience, this restaurant offers fabulous food at very very reasonable price points. Don't let the price fool you though....this place has very good food.

If you sign up, please be gracious to attend, so you don't take the spot of someone who would have attended.

So you can plan:

Meetups in the works to be posted shortly....Saray (Turkish in West Haven), Gusto's (Milford), Kudeta (New Haven) and a Japanese noodle house



There will be a $2.00 Meetup fee collected at the Meetup

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Warm up a cold winter afternoon with authentic Thai food
